name: Carta Celestia
description: Carta Celestia, a small timber-framed shop located a block from the main thoroughfare, is adorned with a globe-shaped sign and filled with reference books, supplies, and partially completed maps. The interior, illuminated by a skylight and oil lamps, houses a large drafting table where a bearded man works on a map. The owner, <u>Master Aurelius Serentius</u>, a distinguished figure with salt-and-pepper hair and piercing blue eyes, demonstrates a calm and measured demeanor, guiding customers and apprentices into the captivating realm of cartography. Apprentice <u>Eleanora Marlowe</u>, a young and vibrant woman, practices mapping techniques under Aurelius’s tutelage and often marks maps with stylized images of native flowers.

quest.name: The Cartographer’s Lament
quest.description:
As visitors peruse Master Serentius’ mapmaker shop, they stumble upon a peculiar map hidden in the depths of the shelves.
	This ancient parchment seems to reveal the location of a mythical city named “Caelum Noctus,” the Celestial City of Night. Legend has it that this city exists on the other side of the known world, accessible only during a celestial alignment that occurs once in a century. It sits unloved because Serentius believes it to be a fake and of no value– but he will happily sell it to the visitor for an exorbitant price.
